item.description:
Reiki is special in both a spiritual and physical way. It is something that a lot of people have expressed interest in but have never had the opportunity to learn about.

This will be our opportunity to learn the basic principles of Reiki and then practice it. Our instructor Julia is a passionate practitioner and teacher with years of experience.

We will be meeting at a very comfortable location in Dedham. The address will be given to people who have a serious Yes RSVP a couple of days before.

Donations are voluntary. We will be giving Julia about $100. If you can donate $10 then it will make our costs lower.

Feel free to bring snacks. There will be a couch, chairs and room to lie comfortably on the floor. This will be an interesting, educational, relaxing and exciting event!
item.name: Learn and Practice Reiki!
